name: Invalid CustomerApplication ID - Loan Application
fullName: Loan Application lists#Invalid CustomerApplication ID - Loan Application
description:
Uses an array to pass the values of single or multiple CustomerApplicationID(s) in the Request Body

e.g:

\[

"6663fe0a-214c-48e3-84d5-5a8b7912bbca",

"6663fe0a-214c-48e3-84d5-5a8b7912bbca"

\]
